original_text: You must offer those gifts to the Lord at the times of the feasts. You must do that even if you have given your usual burnt offering, grain offerings, drink offerings or friendship offerings. And you must do it even if you have given other offerings. You might have given those other offerings because you wanted to give them. Or you might have given them because you had promised to give them.” ’
korean_text: 너희가 이 절기를 당하거든 여호와께 이같이 드릴지니 이는 너희의 서원제나 낙헌제로 드리는 번제, 소제, 전제, 화목제 외에 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You must offer those gifts to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 예물들을 주께 드려야 한다

sentences.original_text: at the times of the feasts
even if you have given your usual burnt offering
even if you have given other offerings
You might have given those other offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 다른 예물들을 드렸을지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: because you wanted to give them
Or you might have given them
because you had promised to give them
